thread.section_title: Lucky Tackle Box Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lucky Tackle Box | www.luckytacklebox.com | 3 of 13
thread.title: Rick Williams
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Rick Williams

author: Rick Williams
title: Rick Williams
text:
Lucky Tackle Box had an issue with tracking January orders. I was notified of the issue and if it did not arrive by the 25th to let them know. After the postman left, no LTB. I let them know. LTB (Taylor) responded quickly to resolve the issue.
I recieved the replacement box in a few days but, the items did not match the enclosed menu. I notified Taylor and he took care of me, some items were exchanged or substituted but I came out ahead, in my opinion, which is really all that matters. Terrific customer service! Thanks Taylor!
Rick Williams
